item.title: exaone-deep
item.description: EXAONE Deep exhibits superior capabilities in various reasoning tasks including math and coding benchmarks, ranging from 2.4B to 32B parameters developed and released by LG AI Research.

item.title: gemma3
item.description: The current, most capable model that runs on a single GPU.

item.title: qwq
item.description: QwQ is the reasoning model of the Qwen series.

item.title: command-a
item.description: 111 billion parameter model optimized for demanding enterprises that require fast, secure, and high-quality AI

item.title: command-r7b-arabic
item.description: A new state-of-the-art version of the lightweight Command R7B model that excels in advanced Arabic language capabilities for enterprises in the Middle East and Northern Africa.

item.title: granite3.2-vision
item.description: A compact and efficient vision-language model, specifically designed for visual document understanding, enabling automated content extraction from tables, charts, infographics, plots, diagrams, and more.

item.title: phi4-mini
item.description: Phi-4-mini brings significant enhancements in multilingual support, reasoning, and mathematics, and now, the long-awaited function calling feature is finally supported.

item.title: granite3.2
item.description: Granite-3.2 is a family of long-context AI models from IBM Granite fine-tuned for thinking capabilities.

item.title: r1-1776
item.description: A version of the DeepSeek-R1 model that has been post trained to provide unbiased, accurate, and factual information by Perplexity.

item.title: deepscaler
item.description: A fine-tuned version of Deepseek-R1-Distilled-Qwen-1.5B that surpasses the performance of OpenAI‚Äôs o1-preview with just 1.5B parameters on popular math evaluations.

item.title: openthinker
item.description: A fully open-source family of reasoning models built using a dataset derived by distilling DeepSeek-R1.

item.title: deepseek-r1
item.description: DeepSeek's first-generation of reasoning models with comparable performance to OpenAI-o1, including six dense models distilled from DeepSeek-R1 based on Llama and Qwen.

item.title: mistral-small
item.description: Mistral Small 3 sets a new benchmark in the ‚Äúsmall‚Äù Large Language Models category below 70B.

item.title: dolphin-mixtral
item.description: Uncensored, 8x7b and 8x22b fine-tuned models based on the Mixtral mixture of experts models that excels at coding tasks. Created by Eric Hartford.

item.title: mixtral
item.description: A set of Mixture of Experts (MoE) model with open weights by Mistral AI in 8x7b and 8x22b parameter sizes.

item.title: nous-hermes2-mixtral
item.description: The Nous Hermes 2 model from Nous Research, now trained over Mixtral.

item.title: tulu3
item.description: T√ºlu 3 is a leading instruction following model family, offering fully open-source data, code, and recipes by the The Allen Institute for AI.

item.title: phi4
item.description: Phi-4 is a 14B parameter, state-of-the-art open model from Microsoft.

item.title: dolphin3
item.description: Dolphin 3.0 Llama 3.1 8B üê¨ is the next generation of the Dolphin series of instruct-tuned models designed to be the ultimate general purpose local model, enabling coding, math, agentic, function calling, and general use cases.

item.title: smallthinker
item.description: A new small reasoning model fine-tuned from the Qwen 2.5 3B Instruct model.

item.title: granite3.1-dense
item.description: The IBM Granite 2B and 8B models are text-only dense LLMs trained on over 12 trillion tokens of data, demonstrated significant improvements over their predecessors in performance and speed in IBM‚Äôs initial testing.

item.title: granite3.1-moe
item.description: The IBM Granite 1B and 3B models are long-context mixture of experts (MoE) Granite models from IBM designed for low latency usage.

item.title: olmo2
item.description: OLMo 2 is a new family of 7B and 13B models trained on up to 5T tokens. These models are on par with or better than equivalently sized fully open models, and competitive with open-weight models such as Llama 3.1 on English academic benchmarks.

item.title: command-r7b
item.description: The smallest model in Cohere's R series delivers top-tier speed, efficiency, and quality to build powerful AI applications on commodity GPUs and edge devices.

item.title: deepseek-v3
item.description: A strong Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) language model with 671B total parameters with 37B activated for each token.

item.title: mistral-large
item.description: Mistral Large 2 is Mistral's new flagship model that is significantly more capable in code generation, mathematics, and reasoning with 128k context window and support for dozens of languages.

item.title: llama3.1
item.description: Llama 3.1 is a new state-of-the-art model from Meta available in 8B, 70B and 405B parameter sizes.

item.title: hermes3
item.description: Hermes 3 is the latest version of the flagship Hermes series of LLMs by Nous Research

item.title: granite-embedding
item.description: The IBM Granite Embedding 30M and 278M models models are text-only dense biencoder embedding models, with 30M available in English only and 278M serving multilingual use cases.

item.title: exaone3.5
item.description: EXAONE 3.5 is a collection of instruction-tuned bilingual (English and Korean) generative models ranging from 2.4B to 32B parameters, developed and released by LG AI Research.

item.title: llama3.3
item.description: New state of the art 70B model. Llama 3.3 70B offers similar performance compared to the Llama 3.1 405B model.

item.title: snowflake-arctic-embed2
item.description: Snowflake's frontier embedding model. Arctic Embed 2.0 adds multilingual support without sacrificing English performance or scalability.

item.title: sailor2
item.description: Sailor2 are multilingual language models made for South-East Asia. Available in 1B, 8B, and 20B parameter sizes.

item.title: marco-o1
item.description: An open large reasoning model for real-world solutions by the Alibaba International Digital Commerce Group (AIDC-AI).

item.title: falcon3
item.description: A family of efficient AI models under 10B parameters performant in science, math, and coding through innovative training techniques.

item.title: minicpm-v
item.description: A series of multimodal LLMs (MLLMs) designed for vision-language understanding.

item.title: qwen2.5-coder
item.description: The latest series of Code-Specific Qwen models, with significant improvements in code generation, code reasoning, and code fixing.

item.title: aya-expanse
item.description: Cohere For AI's language models trained to perform well across 23 different languages.

item.title: granite3-dense
item.description: The IBM Granite 2B and 8B models are designed to support tool-based use cases and support for retrieval augmented generation (RAG), streamlining code generation, translation and bug fixing.

item.title: granite3-moe
item.description: The IBM Granite 1B and 3B models are the first mixture of experts (MoE) Granite models from IBM designed for low latency usage.

item.title: granite3-guardian
item.description: The IBM Granite Guardian 3.0 2B and 8B models are designed to detect risks in prompts and/or responses.

item.title: athene-v2
item.description: Athene-V2 is a 72B parameter model which excels at code completion, mathematics, and log extraction tasks.

item.title: opencoder
item.description: OpenCoder is an open and reproducible code LLM family which includes 1.5B and 8B models, supporting chat in English and Chinese languages.

item.title: llama3.2-vision
item.description: Llama 3.2 Vision is a collection of instruction-tuned image reasoning generative models in 11B and 90B sizes.

item.title: smollm2
item.description: SmolLM2 is a family of compact language models available in three size: 135M, 360M, and 1.7B parameters.

item.title: nemotron
item.description: Llama-3.1-Nemotron-70B-Instruct is a large language model customized by NVIDIA to improve the helpfulness of LLM generated responses to user queries.

item.title: shieldgemma
item.description: ShieldGemma is set of instruction tuned models for evaluating the safety of text prompt input and text output responses against a set of defined safety policies.

item.title: llama-guard3
item.description: Llama Guard 3 is a series of models fine-tuned for content safety classification of LLM inputs and responses.

item.title: llama3.2
item.description: Meta's Llama 3.2 goes small with 1B and 3B models.

item.title: starcoder2
item.description: StarCoder2 is the next generation of transparently trained open code LLMs that comes in three sizes: 3B, 7B and 15B parameters.

item.title: command-r-plus
item.description: Command R+ is a powerful, scalable large language model purpose-built to excel at real-world enterprise use cases.

item.title: command-r
item.description: Command R is a Large Language Model optimized for conversational interaction and long context tasks.

item.title: qwen2
item.description: Qwen2 is a new series of large language models from Alibaba group

item.title: codestral
item.description: Codestral is Mistral AI‚Äôs first-ever code model designed for code generation tasks.

item.title: granite-code
item.description: A family of open foundation models by IBM for Code Intelligence

item.title: deepseek-coder-v2
item.description: An open-source Mixture-of-Experts code language model that achieves performance comparable to GPT4-Turbo in code-specific tasks.

item.title: phi3.5
item.description: A lightweight AI model with 3.8 billion parameters with performance overtaking similarly and larger sized models.

item.title: yi-coder
item.description: Yi-Coder is a series of open-source code language models that delivers state-of-the-art coding performance with fewer than 10 billion parameters.

item.title: qwen2-math
item.description: Qwen2 Math is a series of specialized math language models built upon the Qwen2 LLMs, which significantly outperforms the mathematical capabilities of open-source models and even closed-source models (e.g., GPT4o).

item.title: reader-lm
item.description: A series of models that convert HTML content to Markdown content, which is useful for content conversion tasks.

item.title: deepseek-v2.5
item.description: An upgraded version of DeekSeek-V2 that integrates the general and coding abilities of both DeepSeek-V2-Chat and DeepSeek-Coder-V2-Instruct.

item.title: reflection
item.description: A high-performing model trained with a new technique called Reflection-tuning that teaches a LLM to detect mistakes in its reasoning and correct course.

item.title: solar-pro
item.description: Solar Pro Preview: an advanced large language model (LLM) with 22 billion parameters designed to fit into a single GPU

item.title: nemotron-mini
item.description: A commercial-friendly small language model by NVIDIA optimized for roleplay, RAG QA, and function calling.

item.title: qwen2.5
item.description: Qwen2.5 models are pretrained on Alibaba's latest large-scale dataset, encompassing up to 18 trillion tokens. The model supports up to 128K tokens and has multilingual support.

item.title: bespoke-minicheck
item.description: A state-of-the-art fact-checking model developed by Bespoke Labs.

item.title: phi3
item.description: Phi-3 is a family of lightweight 3B (Mini) and 14B (Medium) state-of-the-art open models by Microsoft.

item.title: internlm2
item.description: InternLM2.5 is a 7B parameter model tailored for practical scenarios with outstanding reasoning capability.

item.title: gemma2
item.description: Google Gemma 2 is a high-performing and efficient model available in three sizes: 2B, 9B, and 27B.

item.title: nuextract
item.description: A 3.8B model fine-tuned on a private high-quality synthetic dataset for information extraction, based on Phi-3.

item.title: mistral-nemo
item.description: A state-of-the-art 12B model with 128k context length, built by Mistral AI in collaboration with NVIDIA.

item.title: llama3-groq-tool-use
item.description: A series of models from Groq that represent a significant advancement in open-source AI capabilities for tool use/function calling.

item.title: smollm
item.description: ü™ê A family of small models with 135M, 360M, and 1.7B parameters, trained on a new high-quality dataset.

item.description: Embedding model from BAAI mapping texts to vectors.

item.description: BGE-M3 is a new model from BAAI distinguished for its versatility in Multi-Functionality, Multi-Linguality, and Multi-Granularity.

item.title: mistral
item.description: The 7B model released by Mistral AI, updated to version 0.3.

item.title: codegemma

item.description: CodeQwen1.5 is a large language model pretrained on a large amount of code data.

item.description: A strong, economical, and efficient Mixture-of-Experts language model.

item.description: Stable LM 2 is a state-of-the-art 1.6B and 12B parameter language model trained on multilingual data in English, Spanish, German, Italian, French, Portuguese, and Dutch.

item.description: Qwen 1.5 is a series of large language models by Alibaba Cloud spanning from 0.5B to 110B parameters

item.title: all-minilm
item.description: Embedding models on very large sentence level datasets.

item.description: State-of-the-art large embedding model from mixedbread.ai

item.description: Dolphin 2.9 is a new model with 8B and 70B sizes by Eric Hartford based on Llama 3 that has a variety of instruction, conversational, and coding skills.

item.description: Meta Llama 3: The most capable openly available LLM to date

item.description: A model from NVIDIA based on Llama 3 that excels at conversational question answering (QA) and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).

item.description: Aya 23, released by Cohere, is a new family of state-of-the-art, multilingual models that support 23 languages.

item.description: Zephyr is a series of fine-tuned versions of the Mistral and Mixtral models that are trained to act as helpful assistants.

item.description: Starling is a large language model trained by reinforcement learning from AI feedback focused on improving chatbot helpfulness.

item.description: Gemma is a family of lightweight, state-of-the-art open models built by Google DeepMind. Updated to version 1.1

item.description: A suite of text embedding models by Snowflake, optimized for performance.

item.description: DBRX is an open, general-purpose LLM created by Databricks.

item.title: llava

item.description: 7B parameter text-to-SQL model made by MotherDuck and Numbers Station.

item.description: An experimental 1.1B parameter model trained on the new Dolphin 2.8 dataset by Eric Hartford and based on TinyLlama.

item.description: Llama 2 is a collection of foundation language models ranging from 7B to 70B parameters.

item.description: Code generation model based on Code Llama.

item.description: State-of-the-art code generation model

item.description: A top-performing mixture of experts model, fine-tuned with high-quality data.

item.description: A 7B chat model fine-tuned with high-quality data and based on Zephyr.

item.description: The powerful family of models by Nous Research that excels at scientific discussion and coding tasks.

item.title: wizard-math
item.description: Model focused on math and logic problems

item.description: Open-source medical large language model adapted from Llama 2 to the medical domain.

item.title: magicoder

item.description: 2.7B uncensored Dolphin model by Eric Hartford, based on the Phi language model by Microsoft Research.

item.description: BakLLaVA is a multimodal model consisting of the Mistral 7B base model augmented with the LLaVA architecture.

item.title: starcoder
item.description: StarCoder is a code generation model trained on 80+ programming languages.

item.title: falcon
item.description: A large language model built by the Technology Innovation Institute (TII) for use in summarization, text generation, and chat bots.
